indications:
Indications skin manifestations of cutaneous T-cell lymphoma refractory to previous
systemic treatment
name: BEXAROTENE
cautions: Cautions see section 8.1 and notes above; hyperlipidaemia (avoid if uncontrolled), hypothyroidism (avoid if uncontrolled); hypersensitivity to retinoids; avoid in acute porphyria (section 9.8.2); interactions: Appendix 1 (bexarotene)
side-effects: Side-effects see section 8.1 and notes above
doses:
Initially 300 mg/m2 daily as a single dose
with a meal; adjust dose according to response
pregnancy:
Pregnancy avoid; manufacturer advises effective contraception
during and for at least 1 month after treatment in men or women; see
also Pregnancy and Reproductive
Function
